text: Schmidt: The portrait that is painted in the excerpt for the book demonstrates why we have a shattered economy, why there’s more than 100k dead from the inept response to coronavirus. He has no capacity to do the job. He is staggeringly ignorant, uninterested, and corrupt https://t.co/Ta0Kz2V0H9
